description.displayText: We were fortunate to find Ashley as a nanny on care.com for our 1.5 year old daughter. Sadly we moved to another state and couldn't take her with us! Ashley is kind, loving, energetic, playful, honest and reliable. Since day one Ashley was nothing short of amazing. She kept up with our high energy toddler and was her "go-go" girl (as our daughter liked to say. Our daughter was thriving and her vocabulary was expanding daily by being around Ashley. She is punctual, had never missed a day of work and was easy to communicate with. Our home was left tidy and our daughter was safe and always had a smile on her face when she was around Ashley. She has years of experience and multiple references.
